metadata.title: CVE-2017-5547 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.description:
drivers/hid/hid-corsair.c in the Linux kernel 4.9.x before 4.9.6 interactsincorrectly with the CONFIG_VMAP_STACK option, which allows local users tocause a denial of service (system crash or memory corruption) or possiblyhave unspecified other impact by leveraging use of more than one virtualpage for a DMA scatterlist.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-5547` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.10.0-27-generic - 4.10.0-27.30~16.04.2
linux-image-4.10.0-27-generic-lpae - 4.10.0-27.30~16.04.2
linux-image-4.10.0-27-lowlatency - 4.10.0-27.30~16.04.2
linux-image-extra-4.10.0-27-generic - 4.10.0-27.30~16.04.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: linux-hwe package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.10.0-27.30~16.04.2').
